alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 02 at 5:44AM MST until December 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Jackson Hole. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel over open areas of Grand Teton National Park and locations south and west of Jackson could be impacted by the combination of snow and wind. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There will be a relative lull in the snowfall late tonight and Sunday morning. Warming temperatures may hinder snow accumulations Sunday afternoon. For forecast snowfall images, go to weather.gov/riverton/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
